Hero.title: Xitoyni kashf eting
Hero.desc: Xitoy: qadimiy tarix, Buyuk devor, innovatsiyalar, rang-barang madaniyat.

Hero.title: Oroldagi dam olish
Hero.desc: Ajoyib orol manzaralarida tinchlikni his qiling.

Hero.title: Yaponiya
Hero.desc: Zamonaviy hayot va qadimiy an'analar mamlakati.

Hero.title: Dubayni kashf eting
Hero.desc: Birlashgan Arab Amirliklarida hashamat, innovatsiya va sarguzashtni kashf eting.

Hero.title: Tropik Tailand
Hero.desc: Chiroyli plyajlarda dam oling va mazali taomlarni tatib ko'ring.

Hero.title: Sehrli Turkiya
Hero.desc: Turkiyaning boy tarixi va ajoyib manzaralarini kashf eting.
